thread.section_title: Adguard Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Adguard | adguard.com
thread.title: thiruu anand

author: thiruu anand
title: thiruu anand
text:
Hi guys,
Am thiru, from India. It's my pleasure to share my experience with ad guard team support.
I was developed with some issues in my mobile and hence i reset my mobile, followed by ad guard installation.
Sure to my in experience i botched it up and came to ad guard support team for help in the odd hours..
Still the guys responded immediately and sorted out my issues and naturally an too excited to see Their support..
Thank you guys and God bless you all and ad guard...
Thiru
